headline: Is Cigna a Long Term Opportunity After Recent Share Price Weakness in 2025?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Cigna Group is quietly turning into a bargain, you are not alone. This stock often flies under the radar just as the value story starts to get interesting. Despite a 38.6% gain over 5 years, the share price has slipped 14.8% over the last year and is down 3.3% year to date, with a softer 4.3% move over the last week but still a modest 2.3% rise across the past month, hinting at shifting sentiment. Those swings have come as investors weigh Cigna's ongoing...
